title: How Injuries Affect Betting, Going for Two, and the Best 0-2 Teams | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Warren Sharp and Chris Vernon break down the injury-riddled Week 2 and how critical setbacks affect your bets (2:10). Then, they take on the Dallas-Atlanta going-for-two conundrum (10:52), plus the 0-2 and 2-0 teams that they are the most and least confident in (18:58). The two discuss a disheveled Bill Belichick (29:02) and, finally, Warren rips into the Vikings-Jets game and coach Adam Gase (42:33). 
Hosts: Warren Sharp and Chris Vernon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
